# File test/ts_gdata.rb, line 22
  def self.suite
    suite = Test::Unit::TestSuite.new("GData Test Suite")
    suite << UnicodeStringTest.suite
    suite << TS_GData_HTTP.suite
    suite << TS_GData_Client.suite
    suite << TS_GData_Auth.suite
    return suite
  end
